message: User data saving and loading functionality is currently unavailable due to external API dependency failure.

incident.impactSummary: Users are unable to save or load any persistent data.
incident.rootCause: Outage in the external Roblox API dependency.
incident.mitigation: Monitoring external status and escalating internally.
incident.detection: API error rate monitoring and user reports.
actionItems: Communicate user action requirement (rejoining the server).
Monitor user connection and data synchronization rates.
Monitor status of external Roblox API
Investigate potential temporary data caching solutions

postmortemPlan.summary: Analyze dependency failure resiliency and implement strategies for external API unavailability.

timeline.event: System rollback pushed following unsuccessful fix attempt.
Confirmed root cause: External Roblox API down, preventing data access.

communications.message: rollback status to degraded: Rollback has been pushed following a fix. Users must rejoin the server to restore access to old data.
